title: 求助权限问题（还是别的问题，反正有问题）
author: dajiangtang
txt_content:
我弄了个水桶服务器。新弄个图进去什么都破坏不了。不再保护区也不行。总是显示you are not permitted to build




2011-12-07_11.57.35.png (153.19 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2011-12-7 12:00 上传






然后我的groups.yml是这样的

# Group inheritance
# any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# These groups are defined in the globalgroups.yml
# and can be inherited in any worlds groups/users.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and defined in the this groups.yml file.
groups:
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: ture
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

哪位大神帮忙看看是什么毛病。感激不尽

replies.author: Mr.Seven590
replies.txt_content:
你的Default:
     default: true
     permissions:
     - -bukkit.command.kill
     inheritance:
     - g:essentials_default
     - g:bukkit_default
     info:
       prefix: '&e'
       build: ture
       suffix: ''
 下的build：应该是true而不是ture，你改一下就可以了，这权限组默认是不能修改地形的

replies.author: dajiangtang
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-12-7 12:58 
build: ture  。。。。true啊大哥
谢谢版主。不过上面老兄先发了。所以答案就给他了。。。

replies.author: Rear
replies.txt_content: 我也遇过，但是重开就行了 ！
